article_title: Is Outrage Over Generational Theft In Obamacare Much Ado About Nothing?

article_metadata.author: The Apothecary

og.description: In this week's Economix column, Princeton economist Uwe Reinhardt suggests that the real health care ‘war’ on the young is being waged by employers. This echoes a rhetorical query voiced by Adrianna McIntyre at Austin Frakt's The Incidental Economist blog last November:  "Where is the outrage over employer-sponsored coverage in the [...]
